metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8761 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: inc/template.php in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a only checks for access to the root namespace, which allows remote attackers to access arbitrary images via a media file details ajax call.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
